segments.text: Hello Mr Fang ! It's good to see you again . What can we do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Miao Ping . I'd like to open a Foreign Currency Account today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That shouldn't be a problem , Mr Fang . Have you got your Certificate of Use of Foreign Exchange Account and the Foreign Exchange Account Opening Notice with you ? Our most widely used currencies are US dollar , Japanese yen and Hong Kong dollar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to open a US dollar account , trade with America is going up each year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will transact this for you as soon as we can after the materials you have given me have been checked and verified .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good , thanks . I look forward to hearing from you .
segments.speaker: S2
